description:
Approval of details pursuant to conditions 58 (new windows), 62 (samples of facing materials), 63 (plumbing or pipes), 64 (joinery details), 65 (replacement windows), 68 (details of steps, railings and windows), 69 Brick cleaning), 70 (retention of architectural features), 72 (matching materials) and 73 (plumbing and pipes), attached to planning permission reference P000434, dated 10th June 2002, and withdrawal of condition 71 of the same permission. 

 APPLICANT'S PLAN NOS.:  BDR06-3357-T(20)E07D, E08D, E09D,                         E12D, A-D P00C, P01C, T(31)D01D,                         D03, T(37)D02C and Stonewest Ltd                         report, September 2002
decision_conditions: Condition 61 (Archaeological watching brief) has already been discharged under reference P021881.
